commands.name: Build single vlan on shared ports

snippets.text: {{flow service-level create port <<AES_UPLINK_PORT>> slid <<SLID>> cir <<BANDWIDTH_10>> pir <<BANDWIDTH_10>>  name <<PSR>>_<<VLAN>>}}
{{flow service-mapping create vlan <<VLAN>> src-port <<LEC_CUST_FACING_PORT>> dst-port <<AES_UPLINK_PORT>> slid <<SLID>>}}

variables.label: SLID
variables.dataCommand:
config save
conf search string slid

commands.name: Build multiple vlans with 1 shared port and 1 dedicated port

snippets.text: {{port set port <<LEC_CUST_FACING_PORT>> speed <<TEN_OR_HUNDRED>>  duplex full auto-neg off}}
{{flow service-level create port <<AES_UPLINK_PORT>> slid <<SLID1>> cir <<BANDWIDTH_10>> pir <<BANDWIDTH_10>>  name <<PSR>>_<<VLAN1>>}}
{{flow service-mapping create vlan <<VLAN1>> src-port <<LEC_CUST_FACING_PORT>> dst-port <<AES_UPLINK_PORT>> slid <<SLID1>>}}
{{flow service-level create port <<AES_UPLINK_PORT>> slid <<SLID2>> cir <<BANDWIDTH_10>> pir <<BANDWIDTH_10>>  name <<PSR>>_<<VLAN2>>}}
{{flow service-mapping create vlan <<VLAN2>> src-port <<LEC_CUST_FACING_PORT>> dst-port <<AES_UPLINK_PORT>> slid <<SLID2>>}}

variables.label: SLID1
variables.dataCommand:
config save
conf search string slid

commands.name: Build single vlan with 1 shared port and 1 dedicated port

snippets.text: {{port set port <<LEC_CUST_FACING_PORT>> acceptable-frame-type all pvid <<VLAN>> egress-untag-vlan <<VLAN>> vlan-ingress-filter off}}
{{Port set port <<LEC_CUST_FACING_PORT>> speed <<TEN_OR_HUNDRED>> duplex full auto-neg off}}

commands.name: Build single vlan with VC/VS on dedicated customer port for ELS/ETS/UES

snippets.text: {{virtual-switch ethernet create vs <<VS_NAME>> vc <<VC_NAME>> encap-fixed dotpri 6}}
{{flow service-level create port <<AES_UPLINK_PORT>> slid <<SLID>> cir <<BANDWIDTH_10>> pir <<BANDWIDTH_10>>  name <<PSR>>_<<VLAN>>}}
{{flow service-mapping create vlan <<VLAN>> src-port <<LEC_CUST_FACING_PORT>> dst-port <<AES_UPLINK_PORT>> slid <<SLID>>}}

variables.label: SLID
variables.dataCommand:
config save
conf search string slid

commands.name: Build single vlan with customer GIG port

snippets.text: {{port set port <<LEC_CUST_FACING_PORT>> acceptable-frame-type tagged-only pvid 1 egress-untag-vlan 1}}
